wikipedia_page.main: Jack Crabtree is a contemporary English figurative painter and teacher. He is known for a series of paintings documenting the South Wales coal industry.

response: Jack Crabtree is a former American football quarterback who was the most valuable player of the 1958 Rose Bowl, despite the fact that his team lost the game.
*Jack Crabtree – contemporary artist; born in RochdaleJack Crabtree at Art In Wales
* Jack Crabtree, a former American football player
* Jack Crabtree (artist), an English contemporary artist
